website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight, highly portable device provides relief at home and during travel.
pros: Lamp features advanced optics to filter heat from the 300W bulb and spread it more evenly over the treatment area
Tilts up to 35 degrees for easy positioning
cons: The lamp gets extremely hot and takes a bit of time to cool down before you can start another treatment cycle

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I had a serious migraine out of nowhere. I used this in my face and within the amount of time the timer has slotted, my migraine was gone! If I have anymore migraines this will be my first go to since I don’t like to use medicines.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Ease pain with this heat lamp
customer_reviews.text: The light heat lamp helps to ease arthritis pain in my knees and ankle. I recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Giordano

customer_reviews.title: Stiff Joints
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product for a few days and I can really feel a difference in stiffness of my joints.
customer_reviews.author: Keko Rutledge

customer_reviews.title: Eases lower back pain
customer_reviews.text: This infrared heater definitely eases my lower back pain. I have an older model from another company but it didn’t have the handle and didn’t tilt as easily as this one. The actual screen size of this device is 6” x 7 inches if that helps anyone comparing units. I didn’t see that in the materials and wished the seller had added it. I hoped from photos and the screen description that it would be larger
customer_reviews.author: DJ Scala

customer_reviews.title: Helping with my back pain
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be helping with my cramping back muscles. Hope the improvements continue
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Works as published
customer_reviews.text: I have massive lower back pain from 7 compressed disks. 6 minutes application gives me terrific pain relief for about 4 to 6hrs per application.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Myer

customer_reviews.title: Price to high for product longevity
customer_reviews.text: It only been 3 months and already the light doesn’t work. Great when it works though. Just need something that last longer than three months. For that price the price is to high way to high for only 3 months. I bought it in April 2019. It now July 2019.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Follow the Directions
customer_reviews.text: I am using this as Therapy for sinus problems I get during Winter in Michigan. I am feeling improvement after only 2 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great for heat therapy
customer_reviews.text: My wife has used this for heat therapy for sore muscles; works well and does not take up much space.
customer_reviews.author: shadetree351

customer_reviews.title: Infrared light therapy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this infrared light for about one week now and I know it’s not a long time but my hands already feel better.l, less achy. I’m excited to keep using the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte Hellhoff

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for Treatments
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for use in my practice. Being raised in Europe I grew up with the infar red treatments for bumps, breaks and bruises. I use this on my clients and have great results. Purchase was easy and shipment fast, well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: carmen m buckalew

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I suppose I am happy with this purchase. Not quite sure I can tell any difference with my problem. Also, it has caused a wall plug to go out. Must draw a lot of electricity!
customer_reviews.author: Judy Bell

customer_reviews.title: Feet are finally warm
customer_reviews.text: my feet have poor circulation. I put one of these under my desk and they're finally warm without drying out the air around me. pain relief is obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Bry

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best purchase I’ve ever made. My MD doctor recommended it for my intense lower back pain and sciatica. After about 5 - 30 minute treatments, the pain is almost completely gone.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Like It!
customer_reviews.text: I love the warmth it gives off, easy to use, and easy to move around! But I don't like how it is only 15 minute timer, and randomly shuts off if I cycle it again
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my old dog who suffers from joint pain. I see improvement in his mobility just after two das!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: This products is amazing.  The seller did a great job fulfilling my order in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.text: We had one of these and have found it to be extremely helpful. I ordered three more for other family members.
customer_reviews.author: Sue L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy source of pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I love this heat lamp. I use it to decrease inflammation pain. I use it for 30 minutes everyday and I experience pain relief as well as an energy boost. I highly recommend. The only disadvantage so far is the timer can only be used for 15 minutes at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: it works whoop whoop✊
customer_reviews.text: it's awesome and it really works good on all areas of the body 👍👍
customer_reviews.author: 💯👑Dee

customer_reviews.title: Red light and heat!
customer_reviews.text: Generates a nice amount of heat. I use it for knee and hand pain relief.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Diehm

customer_reviews.title: Soothing temporary relief from pain.
customer_reviews.text: I had some back pain and put this lamp into my treatment regime. It really targets the problem areas.
customer_reviews.author: Fred Bloggs

customer_reviews.title: Not much effective
customer_reviews.text: Its OK But too small toy and not much effective
customer_reviews.author: Max B.

customer_reviews.title: Effective remedy .
customer_reviews.text: Portable , very easy to use . Clear instructions . Very good value for money .
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: I bought this brand because it's more reliable than its competitor.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and works fine. I've only used 2x.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Morton

customer_reviews.title: Not sure really. I need to read up on it again.
customer_reviews.text: It was not what I expected. I feel very little emanating from the unit.
customer_reviews.author: mdsimpson

customer_reviews.title: A good sturdy product
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this same light about 6 years ago , loved it so much for pain relief that we bought one for my mother my mother in law, my aunt, my best friend , my neighbor bought one , and this one we just bought for our son and his wife. We’ve purchased them over the years not all at once ! They really do help with aches and pains injury’s and just helping you feel warmed up in the cold and gloomy winter months. Ours is getting older so we may be getting another for ourselves soon! Thanks for making a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I'd like to share my wonderful experience with you
customer_reviews.text: This lamp helps me reduce muscle and connective tissues pain on a noticeable level . I do Dry sauna regularly at my gym, but this infrared lamp definitely can focus and penetrate the heat deeper into the pain area in your convenience ! I wasn't aware how much I've depended on it until few days ago It stopped working, so I contacted the seller mibest - they've been really nice and very helpful quickly sending me a replacement unit without any hassle .The whole experience took 3 days . I'm truly grateful !
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Very Relaxing
customer_reviews.text: Initial using - about 5 times. Works well. Is very well made. I did not get any immediate relief, but later in the day, my shoulders did not have the tension in them that accumulates as the day passes. I need to spend more time using this for my knees and feet. Overall, it is a real treat to just sit there and feel the warmth penetrate into my tissues.
customer_reviews.author: Delight

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and my back pain got much better
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and my back pain got much better, it's a good deal!
customer_reviews.author: Mao Yizi

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Hey I feel that it works.. I have planar fasciitis and my husband has neuropathy and I feel like it makes a difference in our feet..
customer_reviews.author: D. Robles

customer_reviews.title: Effective & Economical!
customer_reviews.text: I love that there is a built-in timer so that you do not over treat! Good price! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: C.M.

customer_reviews.title: pain reliver
customer_reviews.text: So impressed by this item. I love how you can actually the warmth, and easily adjust its position. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: I received the lamp in a timely manner. Using it for neck aches and body pains. Would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Reimann

customer_reviews.title: Reliability
customer_reviews.text: I received my product on time and it is tested and prove to be working okay
customer_reviews.author: Coffee Wharf

customer_reviews.title: Pain relief
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter she loves it and according to her she has relief from her pain
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn Schexnayder

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: It is a bit flimsy, but it works really well for now.
customer_reviews.author: Jo King
